snippet: Jeffrey Kessler may not be a household name. But when his signature appears on a lawsuit against a major sports organization, league officials know they are up against a hard-nosed litigator who has built a career taking on sports' most powerful i...
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Kessler may not be a household name. But when his signature appears on a lawsuit against a major sports organization, league officials know they are up against a hard-nosed litigator who has built a career taking on sports' most powerful interests.

headline.main: From NFL to Women's Soccer, Lawyer Is Thorn in Side of Sports Leagues
headline.print_headline: From NFL to Women's Soccer, Lawyer Is Thorn in Side of Sports Leagues
